TopicTitle: No kerbin clouds in Environmental visual enhancements

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I am currently using the latest EVA mod - Interstellar V2. I am running a lot of the extra add-ons within this mod as well as a number of other individual mods. After reinstalling multiple times etc. I still get no kerbin clouds. Here is my output log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/sfzahtvbj6...t_log.txt?dl=0

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

Are you sure you followed the installation instructions exactly? It's not one you can just drop into GameData like most mods.

EDIT: Well EVE is definitely throwing issues in your log. It says it's having trouble finding texture files. Double check the installation procedure.

Edited February 6, 2015 by Alshain
